2 Joe Wike

Position Infield

Height 5-7

Weight 160

Class Junior

Hometown Liverpool, NY

Previous school Bishop Grimes Jr/Sr High School

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

2023 (Sophomore): Started all 48 games he appeared in… produced a .260/.323/.296 slash line… drew 16 walks… had 11 multi-hit games and five 2 RBI games… went 2-for-4 with 2 RBI in the 8-6 victory over Florida Southern on February 7… had a .969 fielding percentage with 137 assists and 110 putouts… turned 30 double plays.

2022 (Freshman): Started all 48 games at second base… Named to the All-SSC Defensive Team… had a .274/.343/.312 slash line… hit one homerun, four doubles while totaling 51 hits overall… scored 27 runs and drew 19 walks… went 6-for-7 on the base path… had a .976 fielding percentage with 141 assists and 103 putouts… turned 32 double plays… posted a 31-game reached base streak throughout the season...recorded his first career hit against Georgia Southwestern (Feb. 5) in hte season opener...went 5-for-13 against Barry in the series...went 3-for-4 with a run scored against No. 2 Tampa...Named to SSC Spring Commissioner's Honor Roll

2021 (Freshman): No competition due to COVID19... Named to SSC Spring Commissioner's Honor Roll

Prior to Eckerd: Prepped at Bishop Grimes Jr/Sr High School in New York... was a three-sport athlete, lettering in baseball, basketball, and football... received MVP honor his senior year fin all three sports... named to the All-CNY First Team for both baseball and football and All-CNY Second Team in basketball.

Personal: Son of John Wike and Melissa ... has one four siblings John, Jenna, Julia, and Joelle... John played baseball at Cazenovia (NY) from 2016-2020 and sister Jenna currently plays softball at Merrimack (Mass.)...hobbies include baseball, watching movies, and fishing...favorite athlete is Bo Jackson.. favorite team is the New York Yankees.

Major: Communication

AWARDS/HONORS

SSC All-Defensive Team (2022)

SSC Spring Commissioner's Honor Roll (2021, 2022)
